Pictures and videos on social media show: 2. Reports from reputable news outlets such as The Washington Post, CNN, and Politico confirming the banishment of soldiers from Capitol premises and resting areas to the parking garage.
Testimonies from soldiers themselves: highlighting poor resting conditions in the parking garage, including inhaling exhaust fumes, limited bathrooms, lack of sleep due to harsh lights, and inadequate facilities such as electrical outlets and internet reception.
Soldiers reporting the risk of COVID: 19 infection due to being forced to rest in close quarters without proper procedures in place to prevent the spread of the virus.
